name: Planetary Planter (itch)
description:
UPDATE: We have been working on this game since the libgdxJam ended. The updated version is available here: Galax Seed and we've included it in the Kentucky Fried Pixels bundle here: Kentucky Fried Pixels, 17 games, $1

This is a very basic arcade shooter game. You are in a fruit-inspired spaceship that's shooting seeds out into space, trying to spread plant-life to these angry asteroids. Once an asteroid is planted enough, life sprouts, and it stops flinging pieces of itself out into the galaxy.
